about_the_game:
About Game

This is a 2.5D pixel style action game with a refreshing fighting experience.

About Story
Reimu and her friends made an appointment to go to a small island in the lake for vacation.At this time, a large number of Kedama suddenly appeared in Lotus Land, making Lotus Land a mess.
But Reimu didn't bother to care about them, thinking that they were too weak to get rid of them at all.At this time, suddenly the Kedama Great Demon King descended from the sky.
“I have Kedama free trial spell card for a limited time. Come and have a "fair" duel with Kedama! If you can defeat Kedama, you can get a lot of gold coins!How, become a soft and cute Kedama, and still get rich. Are you excited?”
Reimu:”It seems like a lot of fun! ! !”$w$.
Reimu, who has become Kedama, remembered to ask Kedama the Great Demon King:”How long does this experience card last?”
Kedama Great Demon King:”Of course it is unlimited! Hahaha! I took your body away! !”
Reimu:”!!!”

So Reimu had to embark on the adventure of being ridiculed by her friends and finding her own body in order to change back to her original self.But with the adventure, she gradually realized that this is a conspiracy! Who in the end ordered the Kedama big devil to do this?

About Fighting

Through a large number of different spell cards, you can enhance your own combat ability.At the same time, different combinations of spell cards can be used to produce skills that can change in various forms.Even according to the acquisition of spell cards, change the difficulty of the battle and challenge your limits.At the same time, you can also unlock new spell cards to form a new combat experience.

About Others

Welcome to play this game~~

short_description: “TouHou Legend of Fairy Souls” is a TouHou fan game.In the game, because of someone's conspiracy, Reimu turned into Kedama and caused her power to weaken.Reimu then had to embark on an adventure to recover herself and finally uncover who was behind the scenes.
